Name: Merchant EXP
Desc: The EXP earned from explorations and events. Can be used to upgrade the Main City.

Name: Golden Shell
Desc: Earned from trades and explorations. Can be used to upgrade the Main City or purchase islands. The number of Golden Shells will affect your final points.

Name: Production
Desc: Indicates the base production efficiency of each product. Can be increased by upgrading the Main City.

Name: Exploration Points
Desc: Indicate the number of explorations that can be carried out each quarter. Will be replenished to the maximum at the beginning of the next quarter.

Name: Visibility
Desc: The area visible to you during the exploration.

Name: Free Construction
Desc: Free lunches can be real! Construct buildings at no cost.
